content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am addicted to work. I cannot stop myself.
That is really rough. It' s been hard for me to deal with the way I am feeling, as I have felt very isolated. Did you feel isolated before?
Yes I have no one to spend any happy hour with. So I am addicted to work.

I understand how you feel. I have had to get away from friends and family because of social distancing. They may be feeling the same way. I also have had a hard time finding good enough friends because of work, and that has really added to my problem. I know it' s frustrating and isolating.
